programme.title: Marathon Race Walk Mixed Relay | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This Marathon Race Walk Mixed Relay took place at the Trocadero, Paris, on 07/08/24. Martin A/Perex M (ESP) won the Gold with a time of 2:50:31 hours. Pintado BD/Morejon G (ECU) claimed Silver, and Cowley R/Montag J (AUS) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's Long Jump Heptathlon Group A | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Long Jump Heptathlon Group A took place at Stade de France, France, on 09/08/2024. Sofie Dokter (NED) ranked to first place with a distance of 6.26m. Adrianna Sulek-Schubert (POL) ranked second and Xenia Krizsan (HUN) came third.

programme.title: Track and Field - Day 14 - Afternoon | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Track and Field Day 14 Afternoon Session took place at the Stade de France, Paris, on 09/08/24. It included the Final for Women's 4 x 400m Relay, where Team USA claimed the Gold. At the Women's Shot Put Final, it was Yemisi Ogunleye (GER) who would win the Gold medal. Later, at the Men's 4 x 100m Relay Final, it was Team Canada at the top, with the Gold. At the Women's 400m Final, Marileidy Paulino (DOM) claimed victory, and the Gold, while at the Men's Triple Jump Final Jordan Alejandro Diaz Fortun (ESP) took the Gold. At the Women's 10,000m Final, Beatrice Chebet (KEN) won another Gold medal, and finally, at the Men's 400m Hurdles Final Rai Benjamin (USA) claimed victory, and the Gold Medal.

programme.title: Arriba Cuba
programme.desc: An exploration of the past, present and future of sports in Cuba at a time of unprecedented change.

programme.title: Anatomy of: Cycling BMX, Basketball 3x3, and Surfing
programme.desc: In a sports science lab, we studied the physiques of BMX racer Connor Fields, basketball player Laetitia Guapo, and Surfer Brisa Hennessy to find out what makes them special at their sports.

programme.title: Finals Piste: Women's Foil Team Bronze & Gold Medal Bouts | Fencing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Foil Team Bronze and Gold Medal Bouts took place on 01/08/2024 at the Grand Palais - Podium Piste. In the Gold Medal Bout, United States of America won the Gold over Italy, who won Silver. In the Bronze Medal Bout, Japan took the Bronze over Canada.

programme.title: Can Buff Dude @Brandon_Myles survive Enzo Lefort's Fencing workout?
programme.desc: French Olympian Enzo Lefort takes on bodybuilding influencer Brandon White to unravel what really goes into the making of a foil fencer.

programme.title: BRA-USA - Women's Gold Medal Match | Football | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This Woman's Gold Medal Match took place at Parc des Princes, Paris, on 10/08/2024. The United States of America won the Gold with a victory over Brazil. Final score USA 1:0 BRA.

programme.title: Neymar Jr: A shot to heal a nation | Wait For It
programme.desc: A 24-year-old Neymar is about to shoot a penalty kick that may close decades-old wounds and change Olympic history forever.

programme.title: How the J-Village became a symbol of the recovery of Fukushima.
programme.desc: The national soccer training centre served as a base for cleanup efforts after the nuclear disaster; eight years later is fostering the next generation of Japanese footballers again.

programme.title: Men's Final | Modern Pentathlon | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Modern Pentathlon Men's Final took place at Château de Versailles, Paris on 10/08/24. Ahmed Elgendy (EGY) won the Gold Medal, Taishu Sato (JPN) won the Silver medal and the Bronze medal was for Giorgio Malan (ITA).

programme.title: Road to Glory - Athletics - The Middle Distance
programme.desc: The stories behind the key moments in middle distance running at the Olympic Games, including stars like Paavo Nurmi and Maria Mutola.

programme.title: Individual All-Around Final | Rhythmic Gymnastics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
This session contains the Individual All-Around Final which took place at La Chapelle Arena, Paris at 09/08/2024.
Darja Varfolomeev (GER) won Gold, Boryana Kaleyn (BUL) won Silver and Sofia Raffaeli (ITA) won Bronze.

programme.title: Nastia Liukin at age 16
programme.desc: American gymnast Nastia Liukin has a fine sporting pedigree through her parents and as a teenager in Texas she wanted to follow their lead.

programme.title: Thema Williams: Gymnastics as an everyday outdoor activity | Her Game
programme.desc: Watch the inspiring Thema Williams explain how she takes gymnastics and ‘finesses’ it. She was the first gymnast in her country to compete at the World Championships in 2011. Featured song: Stop this Flame by Celeste

programme.title: Women's 25m Pistol Finals | Shooting | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Shooting 25m Pistol Finals were held on 03/08/2024 at Chateauroux Shooting Centre, Paris. Yang Jiin (KOR) claimed Gold, Camille Jedrzejewski (FRA) SIlver and Veronika Major (HUN) completed the podium

programme.title: Women's 5000m Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 5000m Final took place at Stade de France, on 05/08/24. Beatrice Chebet (KEN) won Gold with a time of 14:28.56 minutes. Faith Kipyegon (KEN) won Silver and Sifan Hassan (NED) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 800m Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 800m Final took place at Stade de France, on 05/08/24. Keely Hodgkinson (GBR) won Gold with a time of 1:56.72. Tsige Duguma (ETH) took Silver and Mary Moraa (KEN) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 3000m Steeplechase Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 3000m Steeplechase Final took place at Stade de France, on 06/08/24. Winfred Yavi (BRN) won Gold with an Olympic record time of 8:52.76 minutes. Peruth Chemutai (UGA) won Silver, and Faith Cherotich (KEN) completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's 1500m Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 1500m Final took place at Stade de France, on 06/08/24. Cole Hocker (USA) won Gold with an Olympic record time 3:27.65 minutes. Josh Kerr (GBR) won Silver, and Yared Nuguse (USA) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 200m Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 200m Final took place at Stade de France, on 06/08/24. Gabrielle Thomas (USA) won Gold with a time of 21.83 seconds. Julien Alfred (LCA) won Silver, and Brittany Brown (USA) completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's 100m Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 100m Final took place at Stade de France, on 04/08/24. Noah Lyles (USA) won Gold with a time of 9.79 seconds. Kishane Thompson (JAM) took Silver and Fred Kerley (USA) completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's 400m Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 400m Final took place at Stade de France, on 07/08/24. Quincy Hall (USA) won Gold with a time of 43.40 seconds. Matthew Hudson-Smith (GBR) won Silver and Muzala Samukonga (ZAM) completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's 3000m Steeplechase Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 3000m Steeplechase Final took place at Stade de France, on 07/08/24. Soufiane El Bakkali won Gold with a time of 8:06.05 minutes. Kenneth Rooks (USA) won Silver, and Abraham Kibiwot (KEN) completed the podium.

programme.title: Final Men's 200m | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 200m Final took place at Stade de France, on 08/08/24. Letsile Tebogo (BOT) won Gold with a time of 19.46sec. Kenneth Bednarek (USA) took Silver, and Noah Lyles (USA) completed the podium.

programme.title: Final Women's 400m Hurdles | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 400m Hurdles Final took place at Stade de France, on 08/08/24. Sydney McLaughlin-Levrone (USA) won Gold with a World Record time of 50.37 seconds. Anna Cockrell (USA) won Silver, and Femke Bol (NED) completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's 110m Hurdles Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 110m Hurdles Final took place at Stade de France, on 08/08/24. Grant Holloway (USA) won Gold with a time of 12.99 seconds. Daniel Roberts (USA) won Silver, and Rasheed Broadbell (JAM) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 4x100m Relay Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 4x100m Relay final took place at Stade de France, on 09/08/24. The United States of America won Gold with a time of 41.78 seconds. Great Britain won Silver and Germany completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 400m Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 400m Final took place at Stade de France, on 09/08/24. Marileidy Paulino (DOM) won Gold with an Olympic Record time of 48.17 seconds. Salwa Eid Naser (BRN) won Silver and Natalie Kaczmarek (POL) completed the podium.

programme.title: Road to Glory - Athletics - The Middle Distance
programme.desc: The stories behind the key moments in middle distance running at the Olympic Games, including stars like Paavo Nurmi and Maria Mutola.

programme.title: Women's Park Finals | Skateboarding | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Skateboarding Park Final with Arisa Trew (AUS), Cocona Hiraki (JPN), and Sky Brown (GBR) at La Concorde 4, France, on 06/08/24. Arisa Trew (AUS) won Gold with a total score of 218.2. Cocona Hiraki (JPN) won the Silver Medal and Sky Brown (GBR) won the Bronze Medal.

programme.title: Rachelle Vinberg: New York City skate of mind | Urbanity
programme.desc: Skate Kitchen star Rachelle Vinberg combines her love of skateboarding and the city streets to give us a personal tour of her life and the “Big Apple”

programme.title: Men's Skeet Finals | Shooting | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Shooting Skeet Final was held on 03/08/2024 at Chateauroux Shooting Centre, Paris. Vincent Hancock (USA) claimed the Gold, Conner Lynn Prince (USA) took Silver and Lee Meng Yuan (TPE) completed the podium

programme.title: Men's Lead Semi-Final, Women's Speed Final | Sport Climbing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
This session includes the Men's Boulder & Lead Semi-Final, the Women's Speed Quarter-Final, Women's Speed Semi-Final and the Women's Speed Final which took place at Le Bourget Sport Climbing Venue on 07/08/24.
The Women's Speed Final was won by Aleksandra Miroslaw (POL) with Gold, Deng Lijuan (CHN) with Silver and Aleksandra Kalucka (POL) with Bronze.

programme.title: Margie Didal: do what you love - Philippines / Skateboarding I By Her Rules
programme.desc: Margie first encountered skateboarding while helping her mother sell street food to make ends meet. Now she supports her family as one of the top skateboarders in Asia. Being a skater, she is a bit of a rebel in Filipina culture, but she is the sport sensation of the country and a strong chance of a medal at Tokyo 2020. She is paving the way for the next generation of women in skateboarding.

programme.title: Rachelle Vinberg: New York City skate of mind | Urbanity
programme.desc: Skate Kitchen star Rachelle Vinberg combines her love of skateboarding and the city streets to give us a personal tour of her life and the “Big Apple”

programme.title: In Concert | Sky Brown and Yungblud | From the Top
programme.desc: Yungblud leads Sky to a nearby venue where he and his band perform a private concert for her, the first rock concert Sky has ever attended in her life.

programme.title: Strangest Moments | Episode 2
programme.desc: In this episode: love in the Cold War, USA versus Russia wrestling epic, the Anderson-Scheiss marathon, fencing subterfuge, and gutsy Keri Strugg.

programme.title: Men's Final | Triathlon | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
The Men's Triathlon Final took place on day five of the Olympic Games Paris 2024 at Pont Alexandre III on July 31, 2024 in Paris, France.
Alex Yee (GBR) won Gold, Hayden Wilde (NZL) won Silver and Leo Bergere (FRA) won Bronze.

programme.title: Road to Glory - Athletics - The Middle Distance
programme.desc: The stories behind the key moments in middle distance running at the Olympic Games, including stars like Paavo Nurmi and Maria Mutola.

programme.title: Mixed Relay Final | Triathlon | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Mixed Relay Triathlon Final took place at Pont Alexandre III on August 5, 2024 in Paris, France. Germany claimed Gold, United States Silver, and Great Britain completed the podium.

programme.title: The Olympics On The Record | Episode 6
programme.desc: A new Trinidad star throws himself into the record books, Killy leaves his mark, oldest Olympians, and Kenyan Steeplechase dominance.

programme.title: Men's Semi-Final | Modern Pentathlon | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Semi-Final took place at the Chateau de Versailles on 09/08/24.

programme.title: Silver medallist Samantha Murray visits Zaatari Refugee Camp in Jordan
programme.desc: Olympian Samantha Murray visits Syrian refugees in Zaatari Camp and discovers how they find solace in sports from Table Tennis to Taekwondo.

programme.title: Men's Final | Modern Pentathlon | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Modern Pentathlon Men's Final took place at Château de Versailles, Paris on 10/08/24. Ahmed Elgendy (EGY) won the Gold Medal, Taishu Sato (JPN) won the Silver medal and the Bronze medal was for Giorgio Malan (ITA).

programme.title: Road to Glory - Athletics - The Middle Distance
programme.desc: The stories behind the key moments in middle distance running at the Olympic Games, including stars like Paavo Nurmi and Maria Mutola.

programme.title: Women's Kayak (K1) Semi-Final & Final | Canoe Slalom | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Kayak (K1) Semifinal and Final took place at Nautical St - White Water, on 28/07/24. The Australian Jessica Fox won the Gold with a time of 96.08 seconds. Klaudia Zwolinska (POL) won the Silver, and Kimberley Woods (GBR) won the Bronze Medal.

programme.title: France’s Tony Estanguet I Legends Live On
programme.desc: A look at the Olympic achievements of France’s three-time gold medallist Tony Estanguet, who is now leading the Paris 2024 team.

programme.title: Men's Canoe (C1) Semi-Final & Final | Canoe Slalom | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This Men's Semi-Final and Final took place at Nautical St - White water, France, on 29/07/24. Nicolas Gestin (FRA) won Gold with a time of 91.36 seconds, Adam Burgess (GBR) won Silver, and Matej Benus (SVK) completed the podium.

programme.title: How Benjamin Boukpeti returned home and won Togo’s only Olympic medal
programme.desc: Born and raised in France, slalom canoeist Benjamin Boukpeti opted to represent Togo in Beijing and won a historic Olympic medal
